title: Leaverbuster
body: Yello! Problem with the Leaverbuster guys and gals, battery died during game and reconnected, the "OK" underneath the Leaverbuster wont even highlight with cursor running full repair now, but it seems to be a common issue.

replies.body: Hah! Yeeeaaaaa sorry about that. That must have been pretty frustrating for you. I'm glad you were able to get that figured out!
Well when Riot Games wants you to type "I Agree" it is indeed cap sensitive a nice suggestion box would have saved me the past 30 minutes of AGONY LMAO! Kill this thread.
